issue.title: [CF 1405] /tmw & /tellmewhen not working
issue.body:
Today for some reason /tmw & /tellmewhen are not working. When trying to type it in all I get is "Type /help for a list of command"

 

Today I installed wowinterface's add client Minion, as was trying out a UI addon and had quite a few components, and there were a couple of addons that had updates (or so it said). So anyway I updated them and long story short the UI addon didn't work out as I didn't like it so uninstalled it.

So now that I'm trying to play wow I noticed my TMW "buttons" weren't showing up. So I typed /tmw and it wasn't working. I disabled all addons besides TMW and it still didn't work.

Is there any way to fix this without me having to delete my WTF folder as I don't want to loose all my addon settings.

 

Here are a few screenshots:

http://imgur.com/a/dVTtY


> Posted by CurseForge user Cyph1n | Imported from CurseForge issue #1405 | Raw

comments.body:
Ok I got it working again. But had to uninstall TMW and delete all variable stuff to do with it. But now I have to start again :'(

Edited Apr 29, 2017

> Posted by CurseForge user Cyph1n
